```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(DT)

df <- read_csv('iris.csv')

```

:::{.panel-tabset}

## Sepal

```{r}

plot_ly(df, x = ~Sepal.Length, y = ~Sepal.Width, color = ~Species, type = 'scatter', mode = 'markers') %>%
  layout(title = "Iris Sepal Dimensions")

```

## Petal

```{r}

plot_ly(df, x = ~Petal.Length, y = ~Petal.Width, color = ~Species, type = 'scatter', mode = 'markers') %>%
  layout(title = "Iris Petal Dimensions")

```

:::

<br>

```{r}

datatable(df %>% relocate(Species), rownames = FALSE)

```
